title: Provencal pancake with lentils
directions: Prepare the pancake batter according to the instructions on the package. Fry the bacon cubes in a dry, hot frying pan.
Add the olive oil and fry the celery, pepper, garlic and the Provençal herbs for about 3 minutes. Spoon the lentils with the balsamic vinegar through the vegetable mixture.
Pour a spoonful of pancake batter onto some of the vegetable mixture and brown the pancakes on both sides. Cut into points and serve with tomato or olive tapenade.
ingredients: pack of egg pancake mix (à 400 g)
